statements: SELECT * FROM fitness_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, rating, member_id FROM fitness_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT class_id, feedback_text FROM fitness_feedback WHERE member_id = 101;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM fitness_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM fitness_feedback WHERE member_id = 202 AND class_id = 303;
SELECT * FROM fitness_feedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, member_id, class_id FROM fitness_feedback WHERE member_id = 101 AND class_id = 201 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM fitness_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' OR feedback_text LIKE '%excellent%' ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM fitness_feedback WHERE class_id IN (101, 102, 103) AND rating > 3 ORDER BY class_id, rating DESC;
SELECT member_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM fitness_feedback GROUP BY member_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 4 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM fitness_classes;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, class_description FROM fitness_classes;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, class_description FROM fitness_classes ORDER BY class_name DESC;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, class_description FROM fitness_classes WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, COUNT(*) AS num_classes FROM fitness_classes GROUP BY instructor_name;
SELECT * FROM fitness_classes WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, rating FROM fitness_classes JOIN member_feedback ON fitness_classes.class_id = member_feedback.class_id;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, feedback_text FROM fitness_classes LEFT JOIN member_feedback ON fitness_classes.class_id = member_feedback.class_id WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, rating FROM fitness_classes JOIN member_feedback ON fitness_classes.class_id = member_feedback.class_id WHERE instructor_name = 'Jane Smith' AND rating <= 3;

SELECT class_name, instructor_name, feedback_text, rating FROM fitness_classes JOIN member_feedback ON fitness_classes.class_id = member_feedback.class_id WHERE instructor_name = 'Alice Johnson' OR instructor_name = 'Bob Brown';
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT class_id, rating, comments FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM members ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT class_name, instructor, schedule FROM fitness_classes WHERE max_capacity > 20;
SELECT feedback_id, member_id, rating FROM feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY member_id DESC, feedback_id ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM members WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT class_name, instructor, schedule FROM fitness_classes WHERE max_capacity >= 20 ORDER BY class_id ASC;
SELECT member_id, class_id, rating FROM feedback WHERE comments IS NOT NULL ORDER BY rating DESC, feedback_id DESC;
SELECT class_name, instructor, max_capacity FROM fitness_classes WHERE instructor = 'John Doe' OR instructor = 'Jane Smith' ORDER BY class_name ASC, max_capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, class_time FROM classes;
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM members WHERE member_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM ratings ORDER BY rating_stars DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, class_time FROM classes WHERE EXTRACT(HOUR FROM class_time) = 10;
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM members WHERE member_phone LIKE '555%';

SELECT class_name, member_name, rating_stars FROM classes c JOIN ratings r ON c.class_id = r.class_id JOIN members m ON r.member_id = m.member_id WHERE rating_stars >= 4 ORDER BY rating_stars DESC, class_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM FitnessClasses;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name FROM FitnessClasses ORDER BY class_name ASC;
SELECT member_id, member_name, email FROM Members WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT instructor_name, expertise FROM Instructors WHERE expertise = 'Yoga';
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, average_rating FROM FitnessClasses JOIN Ratings ON FitnessClasses.class_id = Ratings.class_id ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM FitnessClasses;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name FROM FitnessClasses ORDER BY instructor_name DESC;
SELECT instructor_name, AVG(average_rating) AS avg_rating FROM FitnessClasses LEFT JOIN Ratings ON FitnessClasses.class_id = Ratings.class_id GROUP BY instructor_name;

SELECT class_name, member_name, rating, comments FROM FitnessClasses JOIN Feedback ON FitnessClasses.class_id = Feedback.class_id JOIN Members ON Feedback.member_id = Members.member_id WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT instructor_name, total_ratings FROM Instructors JOIN Ratings ON Instructors.instructor_name = Ratings.instructor_name ORDER BY total_ratings DESC;
